metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: Peanut Butter and Banana Smoothie Ingredients:

subsection_analysis.refined_text:
• 1 banana
• 1/2 cup Greek yogurt
• 1/2 cup almond milk
• 1 tablespoon peanut butter
• 1 tablespoon honey
Instructions:
• In a blender, combine banana, Greek yogurt, almond milk, peanut butter, and honey.

• 2 slices whole grain bread
• 4 slices turkey breast
• 1/2 avocado, sliced
• 1/2 cup spinach leaves
• 1 tablespoon mustard or mayo
Instructions:
• Spread mustard or mayo on one slice of bread.

• Ingredients :
o 4 cups cubed bread o 4 tomatoes o 1 cucumber o 1 small red onion o 1/4 cup basil o 1/4 cup olive oil o 2 tablespoons red wine vinegar o 1 teaspoon salt
• Instructions :
o Toast bread cubes until golden.

• Ingredients :
o 4 eggs o 1 cup water o 1/4 cup green onions o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon sesame oil
• Instructions :
o Beat eggs with water, salt, and chopped green onions.

• 1 pound chicken breast, cubed
• 1 small onion, diced
• 2 cloves garlic, minced
• 1 bell pepper, sliced
• 1 cup coconut milk
• 1/2 cup chicken broth
• 2 tablespoons green curry paste
• 1 tablespoon fish sauce
• 1 tablespoon brown sugar
• 1/4 cup fresh basil leaves
• 2 tablespoons vegetable oil
• Cooked rice for serving
Instructions:
• In a large skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium heat.

• Ingredients :
o 4 tomatoes o 1 pound fresh mozzarella o 1/4 cup basil o 2 tablespoons olive oil o 1 tablespoon balsamic glaze o 1 teaspoon salt
• Instructions :
o Slice tomatoes and mozzarella.

• 1 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined
• 4 cloves garlic, minced
• 1/4 cup white wine
• 1/4 cup chicken broth
• 1/4 cup lemon juice
• 1/4 cup butter
• 2 tablespoons olive oil
• 1/4 cup chopped parsley
• Salt and pepper to taste
• Cooked pasta for serving
Instructions:

• Ingredients :

Instructions:

• 1 can tuna, drained
• 1/4 cup mayonnaise
• 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard

Instructions:

• Ingredients :

o Mix urad dal flour, water, and salt to form a dough.

• Instructions :

egg, paprika, salt, and pepper in a bowl.

Instructions:

grated Parmesan cheese, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper.
